15814.en:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>Mr. Minister! Eureka! I've discovered a method to
communicate with Ouren!<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15814.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「大臣サマっ！　見つかりました！
　オーレンと会話する方法を　発見したのデス！<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15814.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 대신님! 찾았습니다!
　오렌과 대화할 방법을 찾아냈습니다!<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15814.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>奇古力大人！我找到了！
我找到和奥连对话的方法了！<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15814.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>奇古力大人！我找到了！
我找到和奧連對話的方法了！<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15815.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>Ooh, well done! It must be divine guidance that
<pc> arrives just as you discovered it.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15815.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「おお　でかしたぞ！
　<pc>どのが　来ているときに
　見つかるとは　まさに　天の導きよな。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15815.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 오오, 정말 잘했네!
　<pc> 공이 와 계실 때 찾아내다니
　이건 하늘의 인도가 틀림없네.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15815.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>噢！做得好！
<pc>大人刚来，就找到了。
这可真是天意啊！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15815.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>喔喔，做得好！
居然在<pc>在場的時候找到，
這可真是天意啊。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15816.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>...So, what is the method? Chop-chop, the sooner
you explain, the better.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15816.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「……して　その方法とは　どんなものじゃ？
　ちゃっちゃと　説明するがよいぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15816.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: ……그래서, 그 방법이 대체 뭔가?
　어서 말해 보게.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15816.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>那……方法是什么？
给我好好说明一下。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15816.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>……那麼，方法是什麼？
簡單地說明一下吧。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15817.en: <start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>Oh-ho! Understood. Well...<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15817.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「おほっ！　了解しました。
　それでは……。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15817.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 오호! 알겠습니다.
　그럼…….<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15817.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>是！好的。
那我开始了……<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15817.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>喔喔！好的。
那我開始了……<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15818.en:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>According to a particular book on witchcraft, the
deceased who have become monsters are driven mad by
hatred for the living.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15818.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「さる呪術書によれば　魔物となった亡者は
　生者への憎悪によって　我を忘れ
　正気を失った状態なのだそうデス。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15818.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 한 주술서에 따르면 마물이 된 망자는
　산 자에 대한 증오로 자아가 사라져
　제정신을 잃은 상태라고 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15818.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>有本咒术书上说，
成为怪物的亡者会因为憎恨生者，而丧失理智。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15818.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>有本咒術書上說，
成為怪物的亡者會因為憎恨生者
而失去自我，喪失理智。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15819.en:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>If we want to converse with them, we must first
bring them back to their senses.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15819.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「彼らと　会話をしたいなら
　まず　正気を取り戻させなくては
　ならないとのこと。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15819.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 망자와 대화하고 싶다면
　우선 제정신으로 돌려놓아야 한다더군요.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15819.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>要想和他们对话，
就必须让他们恢复理智才行。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15819.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>要想和牠們對話，
就必須讓牠們
恢復理智才行。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15820.en:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>To do so, one needs the Requiem Candle, often dropped
by <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s, it is said.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15820.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「そのためには　<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>が
　よく落とす　鎮魂のロウソクという
　呪具が必要なのだそうデス。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15820.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 그러려면 {%sEV_QUE_NAME0}|hpp(이,가)
　종종 떨어뜨리는 진혼의 초라는
　주술 도구가 필요하다고 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15820.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>这需要一种咒具，
即<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>
有时掉落的安魂蜡烛。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15820.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>這需要一種咒具，
也就是<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>
很常掉落的鎮魂蠟燭。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15821.en:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>Upon seeing the light of the Requiem Candle, it is said
that the deceased-turned-monster's sanity will be
restored.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15821.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「鎮魂のロウソクに灯る
　明かりを見れば　魔物となった亡者は
　正気を　取り戻すのだとか……。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15821.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 진혼의 초에 불을 붙여
　그 불을 보게 하면 마물이 된 망자가
　제정신으로 돌아올 것이라는군요.<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15821.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>据说只要看到安魂蜡烛的光芒，
成为怪物的亡者就能恢复理智……<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15821.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>據說只要看到鎮魂蠟燭的光芒，
成為怪物的亡者
就能恢復理智……<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15822.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>...Hmm. As for the <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s, they dwell in
Calsadora Volcano, Dwachakka, and it should not be
too bone-breaking to obtain one...<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15822.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「……ふむ。<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>といえば
　ドワチャッカ大陸の　カルサドラ火山にいるが
　手に入れるには　骨が折れるな……。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15822.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: ……흠, {%sEV_QUE_NAME0}|hpp(은,는)
　드워차카 대륙의 칼사드라 화산에 서식하니
　구하려면 고생 좀 하겠군…….<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15822.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>……唔。说到<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>，
那是多瓦切卡大陆的卡尔萨多拉火山一带的怪物。
想拿到这蜡烛，可没那么容易……<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15822.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>……嗯，說到<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>，
那是多瓦恰卡大陸的卡爾薩朵拉火山一帶的怪物。
想拿到這蠟燭可沒那麼容易……<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15823.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>...I see, I understand now. Thank you for your hard
work, Danderu. That will be all.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15823.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「……なるほど　よくわかった。
　ご苦労だったな　ダンデル。
　もう　下がってよいぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15823.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: ……그래, 알겠네.
　수고 많았네, 단델.
　이만 물러가게나.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15823.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>……原来如此，我明白了。
辛苦你了，丹德尔。
你可以退下了。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15823.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>……原來如此，我明白了。
辛苦你了，丹德爾。
你可以退下了。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15824.en:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>Oh-ho! Thank you very much! Then, I shall take my
leave...<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15824.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>「おっほ！　ありがとうございますデス！
　では　ワタクシは　これにて……。<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15824.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>: 오호! 감사합니다!
　그럼 전 이만…….<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15824.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>哦！多谢您！
那我就此告退……<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15824.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01448 _normal m00001>喔！多謝您！
那我就此告退……<stop_lip_animation n01448 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15825.en: <start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001><pc>, following the story you heard.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15825.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「<pc>どの。
　話は　聞いての通りです。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15825.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: <pc> 공.
　방금 들으신 대로입니다.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15825.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001><pc>大人。
如您所闻。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15825.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001><pc>，
就如您所聽到的那樣。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15826.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>Once again, I ask of you: please fetch the Requiem
Candle, often dropped by <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15826.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「あらためて　お願いしましょう。
　どうか　<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>が　よく落とす
　鎮魂のロウソクを　取ってきてくだされ。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15826.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 정식으로 부탁드리겠습니다.
　부디 {%sEV_QUE_NAME0}|hpp(이,가) 종종 떨어뜨린다는
　진혼의 초를 구해와 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15826.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>再次拜托您！
请把<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>经常掉落的
安魂蜡烛拿来！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15826.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>再次拜託您，
請把<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>很常掉落的
鎮魂蠟燭帶過來吧。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15827.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>Then, continue on to Swordsman Mound-deep in
Becon Valley-and light said candle.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15827.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「そして　そのまま　ベコン渓谷の奥地
　妖剣士の塚まで　おもむき
　ロウソクに　火を灯してください。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15827.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 그리고 그 길로 베콘 계곡 깊숙한 곳에 있는
　요검사의 무덤으로 가
　초에 불을 붙여 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15827.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>然后去贝孔峡谷
深处的妖剑士墓穴，
在那里将蜡烛点亮。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15827.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>然後去貝孔溪谷
深處的妖劍士墓穴，
在那裡點燃蠟燭。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15828.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>I want you to speak with Spirit Swordmaster Ouren and
find out why he seeks Realm's Chalice!<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15828.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「妖剣士オーレンと話して　奴が　どうして
　レムルの聖杯を　求めているのかを
　聞きだしてきてほしいのです！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15828.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 요검사 오렌과 대화를 나눠
　그자가 어째서 레물의 성배를 찾는 것인지
　이유를 알아내 주셨으면 합니다!<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15828.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>和妖剑士奥连对话，
问问他为什么一直在找
雷姆尔的圣杯！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15828.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>我希望你能和妖劍士奧連對話，
問問牠為什麼一直在找
雷姆爾的聖杯！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15829.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>I don't know what connection Ouren and Eidos have,
but I believe that without you, <pc>, this
matter will not be resolved.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15829.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「この件は　オーレンとも　エイドスさまとも
　因縁の深い　<pc>どのでなければ
　果たせぬと思うのですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15829.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 이 일은 오렌과 에이도스 님
　양쪽 모두와 연이 있는 <pc> 공만이
　해내실 수 있을 테니까요.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15829.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001><pc>大人，我觉得
您和奥连、艾伊德斯大人因缘颇深，
所以这件事只有您能做到。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15829.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001><pc>，我覺得
您和奧連、艾伊德斯大人因緣頗深，
所以這件事只有您能辦到。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26333.en:
You have been asked to do a quest. Do you accept?
<select>
Accept
Decline
<select_end><close>
26333.ja:
クエストを　依頼されました。
このクエストを　受けますか？
<select>
うける
やめる
<select_end><close>
26333.ko:
퀘스트 의뢰를 받았습니다.
이 퀘스트를 수락하겠습니까?
<select>
수락하기
그만두기
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hans:
对方委托了任务。
要接受这个任务吗？
<select>
接受
放弃
<select_end><close>
26333.zh-Hant:
對方提出了任務委託。
是否要承接這件任務？
<select>
承接
放棄
<select_end><close>

19000479.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>Ooh, you'll take care of it! Just as expected of Ms.
<pc>. When push comes to shove, you can rely
on a nice gal!<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000479.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「おお　引き受けてくださるか！
　さすがは　<pc>どの。
　いざという時　頼りになる　ナイスギャル！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000479.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 오오, 맡아 주시는 겁니까!
　역시 <pc> 공이십니다.
　여차할 때 의지할 수 있는 나이스 걸!<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000479.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>噢噢，您愿意帮忙吗？
不愧是<pc>大人。
真是关键时刻指望得上的好姑娘！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000479.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>喔喔，您願意幫忙嗎！？
不愧是<pc>。
真是關鍵時刻值得信賴的好女孩！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19000480.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>Ooh, you'll take care of it! Just as expected of Mr.
<pc>. When push comes to shove, you can rely
on a nice guy!<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000480.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「おお　引き受けてくださるか！
　さすがは　<pc>どの。
　いざという時　頼りになる　ナイスガイ！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000480.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 오오, 맡아 주시는 겁니까!
　역시 <pc> 공이십니다.
　여차할 때 의지할 수 있는 나이스 가이!<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000480.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>噢噢，您愿意帮忙吗？
不愧是<pc>大人。
真是关键时刻指望得上的好小伙！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19000480.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>喔喔，您願意幫忙嗎！？
不愧是<pc>。
真是關鍵時刻值得信賴的好男孩！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15831.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>Now then, thank you again and again. <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s
are supposed to be inhabiting Calsadora Volcano,
Dwachakka!<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15831.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「では　くれぐれも　お願いします。
　<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>は　ドワチャッカ大陸の
　カルサドラ火山に　棲息しているはずですぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15831.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 그럼 모쪼록 잘 부탁드립니다.
　{%sEV_QUE_NAME0}|hpp(은,는) 드워차카 대륙의
　칼사드라 화산에 서식할 겁니다!<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15831.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>那这件事就拜托您了！
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>
栖息在多瓦切卡大陆的卡尔萨多拉火山！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15831.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>那這件事就拜託您了！
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>應該就棲息在
多瓦恰卡大陸的卡爾薩朵拉火山！<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

26332.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
受けました。<me 74>

15832.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>I appreciate your eagerness, but it appears that
you are busy with other requests.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15832.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「お気持ちは　うれしいのですが
　どうやら　他の方からの頼まれごとで
　お忙しい　ご様子ですな。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15832.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 마음은 감사합니다만
　보아하니 다른 분의 의뢰로
　바쁘신 것 같군요.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15832.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>您愿意帮忙我很高兴，
但看来您接受了不少其他人的委托，
忙得脱不开身呢。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15832.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>您願意幫忙我很高興，
但看來您接受了不少其他人的委託，
忙得脫不開身呢。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15833.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>Please, take care of those before, and speak with
me again.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15833.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「どうか　先に　そちらを片付けてから
　また　私に　話しかけてくだされ。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15833.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 그쪽 일을 먼저 처리한 후에
　제게 다시 말을 걸어 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15833.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>请您先处理了那些事
再来找我吧。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15833.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>請您先處理完那些事
再來找我吧。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15834.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>...Mmm, that is regrettable.
I would be relieved if you, <pc>, were
entrusted with the task...<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15834.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「……むむう　残念ですなぁ。
　<pc>どのになら　安心して
　仕事を　まかせられるのに……。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15834.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: ……흠, 아쉽군요.
　<pc> 공께서 맡아 주신다면
　저도 마음이 놓일 텐데…….<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15834.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>……唔，真遗憾啊。
<pc>大人肯帮忙的话，
我就可以放心了……<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15834.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>……唔，真遺憾啊。
要是<pc>肯幫忙的話，
我就可以放心交辦工作了……<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15835.en:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>If you were to change your mind, please speak
with me anytime.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15835.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>「また　気が変わりましたら
　いつでも　私に　話しかけてくだされ。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15835.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>: 혹시라도 마음이 바뀌시면
　언제든지 말을 걸어 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15835.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>要是您改变主意了，
随时都可以来找我。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15835.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00004 _normal m00001>要是您改變主意，
隨時都可以來找我。<stop_lip_animation n00004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15836.en:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>Ooooo... Who is it? Who dares to take the Chalice
from me!?<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15836.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>「オォォォォ……　誰だ？
　われから　聖杯を　奪わんとする者は！？<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15836.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>: 으오오오오…… 누구냐?
　누가 내게서 성배를 빼앗으려 하는 것이냐!?<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15836.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>哦哦哦哦哦……是谁？
是谁想夺走我的圣杯？<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15836.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>喔喔喔喔喔……是誰？
是誰想從我這裡搶走聖杯！？<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15837.en: <start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>...Right, you're Gartlant's posse, huh?<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15837.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>「……そうか　貴様
　ガートラントの追っ手だな？<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15837.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>: ……그래, 네놈은
　가트란트에서 보낸 추적자로군?<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15837.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>……我知道了，
你这家伙是加特兰德的追兵吧？<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15837.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>……原來如此，
你這傢伙是加特蘭德的追兵吧？<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15838.en:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>My name is Swordsman Ouren...
Realm's Chalice is my only hope!<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15838.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>「わが名は　剣士オーレン……。
　レムルの聖杯は　われに残された
　ただひとつの　希望！<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15838.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>: 내 이름은 검사 오렌…….
　레물의 성배는 내게 남은
　유일한 희망!<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15838.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>我名为剑士奥连……
雷姆尔的圣杯是我仅存的希望！<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15838.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>我名為劍士奧連……
雷姆爾的聖杯
是我僅存的希望！<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15839.en: <start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>I will never give it to anyone!<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15839.ja: <start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>「けっして　誰にも渡さぬっ！！<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15839.ko: <start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>: 절대, 아무에게도 넘길 수 없다!!<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15839.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>我绝不会把它交给任何人！！<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15839.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>我絕不會讓給任何人！！<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15840.ja: 鎮魂のロウソクに　火を灯しますか？<yesno><close>

15842.ja:
<pc>は　鎮魂のロウソクに
火を灯した。

15843.ja: あたたかい光が　辺りを　つつんでいく……。
15843.zh-Hans: 温暖的光芒扩散到周围……
15843.zh-Hant: 溫暖的光芒逐漸包圍了一帶……

15841.en:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>Ooooo, stay away, stay away!
Stay Awaaaay!!!<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15841.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>「オォォォォ　来るな　来るなっ！
　来るなぁぁぁっ！！！<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15841.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>: 으오오오오, 저리 가! 저리 가라!
　오지 마아아아아!!!<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15841.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>噢噢噢噢噢！别过来，别过来！
别过来！！！<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15841.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>喔喔喔喔喔！別過來，別過來！
別過來────！！！<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15844.en: <start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>Ooooo.... Wh-where? Am I...?<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15844.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>「オォォォォ……。
　こ　ここは？　私は……？<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15844.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>: 으오오오오…….
　여, 여긴? 난……?<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15844.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>噢噢噢噢噢……
这……这里是？我是？<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15844.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>喔喔喔喔喔……
這、這裡是？我……？<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15846.en:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>...That's right. This is Becon Valley. My men and I
came here to investigate the new demon miasma that
drifted into the valley.<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15846.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>「……そうだ。ここは　ベコン渓谷。
　新しい魔瘴の吹き溜まりを　調査するため
　私は　部下たちと共に　この渓谷に来たのだ。<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15846.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>: ……그래, 이곳은 베콘 계곡.
　난 새로운 마장의 분출구를 조사하기 위해
　부하들과 함께 이 계곡을 찾았다.<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15846.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>……想起来了。这里是贝孔峡谷。
为了调查新形成的魔瘴团，
所以我带领部下一起来到这个峡谷。<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15846.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>……想起來了。這裡是貝孔溪谷。
為了調查新形成的魔瘴團，
所以我帶領部下一起來到這個溪谷。<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15847.en:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>...But before we could reach the survey point, the
demon miasma suddenly engulfed my men... Uuugh.<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15847.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>「……だが　調査地点に　たどり着く前に
　突然　吹きだした魔瘴に　部下たちが
　巻き込まれて……　うううっ。<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15847.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>: ……하지만 조사 지점에 도착하기도 전에
　갑자기 뿜어져 나온 마장에
　부하들이 휘말리면서…… 으으윽.<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15847.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>……但是，到达调查地点之前，
突然冒出一阵魔瘴，
部下们被团团围住了……呜呜呜。<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15847.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>……但是，在到達調查地點之前，
部下們被突然冒出的魔瘴
團團包圍……唔唔唔。<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15848.en:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>I told you to leave him be... It seems you've done
a lot of unnecessary work.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15848.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「捨て置けと　言っておいたのに……
　ずいぶん　余計なことをしてくれたようだな。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15848.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 내버려두라고 했거늘……
　쓸데없는 짓을 벌였구나.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15848.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>明明和你说过别管这件事了……
看来你还真是多管闲事啊。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15848.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>明明和你說過別管這件事了……
看來你還真是挺多管閒事的啊。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15849.en:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>...Good grief. I thought, perhaps, if I came here, but
I see now... That it was inevitable.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15849.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「……やれやれ。
　もしやと思って　来てみたが……
　こうなってしまっては　是非もない。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15849.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: ……나 원.
　혹시나 해서 와 봤더니……
　이리 된 이상 어쩔 수 없지.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15849.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……哎呀哎呀。
我不放心，过来看看……
岂料已经发展到这地步，真没办法。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15849.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>……真是的。
我不放心才過來看看……
既然事已至此，那就沒辦法了。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15850.en:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>Ei...do...s? Is that... Eidos? That's right, you and
I... Uuugh.<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15850.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>「エ……ド…ス？　エイ…ドスなのか？
　そうだ　私は　お前に……　うううっ。<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15850.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>: 에……도…스? 에이…도스, 너냐?
　그래, 난 너에게…… 으으윽.<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15850.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>艾伊……德斯？是艾伊德斯吗？
想起来了！我……你……呜呜呜。<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15850.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50004 _normal m00001>艾……德、斯？是艾伊……德斯嗎？
想起來了，我……你……唔唔唔。<stop_lip_animation m50004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15851.en:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Look, Ouren is too confused. For now, please leave
him be.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15851.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「ほれ。オーレンも　混乱しておる。
　今は　そっとしておいてやってくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15851.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 보아라, 오렌도 혼란스러워하지 않느냐.
　지금은 가만 놔두거라.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15851.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你看，奥连的状态很不稳定。
让他静一静吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15851.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你看，奧連也很混亂。
現在先讓他靜一靜吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15852.en:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>I'll tell you what you want to know eventually, but
for now... Please leave this to me.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15852.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「お前さんたちの　知りたいことは
　いずれ　わしから　話してやるから……
　とりあえず　ここは　わしに　まかせてくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15852.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 너희가 궁금해하는 질문에는
　나중에 답해 줄 테니……
　일단 오렌은 내게 맡겨라.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15852.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你们想知道的事，
我迟早会告诉你们的……
总之，这里交给我吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15852.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你們想知道的事，
我遲早會告訴你們的……
總之，這裡交給我吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15853.en:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Tell that to Minister Chigri as well. Now, do as I say
and return to Glen Castle without delay.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15853.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「チグリ大臣にも　そう伝えておけ。
　さあ　そうと決まったら
　さっさと　グレン城に戻るのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15853.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 치그리 대신에게도 그렇게 전하고.
　자, 알아들었으면
　이만 그렌성으로 돌아가거라.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15853.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>把我的话转告给奇古力大臣。
这事就这么定了。
你快回古莲城去吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15853.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>也把這番話轉告奇古力大臣。
這事就這麼定了。
你快回古蓮城吧。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15854.en: <start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>What? You came back?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15854.ja: <start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「なんじゃ？　また来たのか！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15854.ko: <start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 뭐냐? 왜 다시 온 거냐!?<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15854.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>你怎么又来了？<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15854.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>怎麼？你又來了啊！？<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15855.en: <start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Right now, Ouren is in no condition to talk to you.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15855.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「今のオーレンは　お前さんと
　話せるような状態ではない。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15855.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 지금 오렌은 너와
　대화할 수 있는 상태가 아니다.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15855.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>现在奥连神志不清，
没法和你说话。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15855.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>奧連目前的狀態
沒辦法和你對話。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15856.en:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>Listen, just return to Glen Castle! I'll tell you what
you want to know eventually.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15856.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>「いいから　グレン城に　戻っておれ！
　お前さんたちの　知りたいことなら
　いずれ　わしが行って　話してやるわい。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15856.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>: 잠자코 그렌성으로 돌아가거라!
　너희가 궁금해하는 질문에는
　나중에 찾아가 답해 주마.<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15856.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>好了！快回古莲城去，
你们想知道的事，
我迟早会告诉你们的！<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15856.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00001 _normal m00001>好了，快回古蓮城去！
你們想知道的事，
我遲早會告訴你們的。<stop_lip_animation n00001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
